name: Dinari CVX
description: The Dinari CVX dShares token (CVX.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in Chevron Corporation (NYSE: CVX), one of the world's leading integrated energy companies. Each CVX.d token is fully backed by a corresponding Chevron share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, CVX.d provides investors with exposure to Chevron's performance through a regulated financial product, offering benefits such as 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
